Incorrect manga. touma solo cause I say so

Don't know about Touma's dick but his personality won't allow him to be a third wheel to anyone's relationship lol. And those who shit on Touma make me laugh a bit. The boy can go full-on yaoi mode with Accelerator, Acqua, Knight Leader, Fiamma, Ollerus or any other man, and I will still love him, his harem is not what makes him special. He is a hypocrite with a hero complex (plus an impostor syndrome), and that's exactly why he is an interesting character. Not to say the kind who never abandons his friends or any random humans. Not wanting to use the classist card but anime onlys really have that effect to make me to diss on them lol. And only shallow-minded people would want to be Touma only for harem, shakemyfuckinghead. I value my sanity, thank you very much. If you want to be a random harem boy, imagine you as Issei for all I care. Touma is not a safe state for a self-insert. He is never supposed to be one.

Definitely messed up here, considering the LN and anime series on how Touma was poorly treated by Seiri there. This netorare base was the worse tho and idk why this dumbass author made Touma this way as a cuck victim. Definitely a no no. If the og LN author made Touma like a bad ass in hentai NTR he would undoubtedly beat the crap outta the asshole and his so called gf and cut her off. But for this one definitely a 2 outta 10 for me. Disappointed in this work especially for bs NTR standards.
